import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from 'axios'; function Register() { const [values, setValues] = useState({ name: "", email: '', password: '' }) const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://localhost:5100/register', values) .then(res => console.log(res)) .then(err => console.log(err)) } return (
